thread.section_title: TripAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TripAdvisor | www.tripadvisor.com
thread.title: Avantika Dutta

author: Avantika Dutta
title: Avantika Dutta
text:
Trip by Divine holidays for Kl city ,Batu caves and Kuala Selangor( silver monkey feeding and fir fly island ) was very nice and hassle free. The cab was comfortable .Mr Shashi the guide and driver was very helpful and friendly .He was also frailly well informed. Putra Jaya does not form apart of this trip, how ever make it a point to make around of the up coming capital while you are going to Kl-city from Air port or returning to Air port from city.
1/17
